title: Infrashine: Ceramic Flat Iron, 2"
description: Product Description Size: Large- 2 " Infrashine Ceramic Flat Iron, using multi-layer ceramic heating elements, negative ions and far-infrared ray heat, is the only technology that locks in natural moisture and shine. Multi-level heat settings and ceramic plates provide superior protection and styling performance. Safe for all hair types, even dry, damaged or frizzy hair.

title: It's a 10 Miracle Deep Conditioner Plus Keratin, 5 oz
description: Does 10 Things Instantly. Keratin portein enriched, deeply moisturizes. Superior penetration, smoothes, detangles. Restores elasticity and strength, protects color, helps prevent split ends, adds shine and protects from sun damage.
